name: Lightweight Beast Trap
description: Launch a sharpened blade trap at a target location, which takes 1.5 seconds to arm and lasts for 15 seconds.  When triggered, the trap deals 1161 Bleed Damage, an additional 2315 Bleed Damage over 10 seconds, and grants you Minor Force, increasing your Critical Damage by 10% for the duration.  Enemies who activate the trap are immobilized for 2 seconds.
effectLines: The trap can be thrown up to 28 meters away.  Reduces the cost as the ability ranks up.
coefDescription: Launch a sharpened blade trap at a target location, which takes 1.5 seconds to arm and lasts for 15 seconds.  When triggered, the trap deals $1 Bleed Damage, an additional $2 Bleed Damage over 10 seconds, and grants you Minor Force, increasing your Critical Damage by 10% for the duration.  Enemies who activate the trap are immobilized for 2 seconds.
